title: #143: Paul Fishman - How To Self Love, Ending Negative Self Talk, How To Be Confident, & The Blame Game
itunes:title: #143: Paul Fishman - How To Self Love, Ending Negative Self Talk, How To Be Confident, & The Blame Game
description:
On this episode we sit down with Self Love coach Paul Fishman to discuss what it means to be confident and happy with who you are. We dive into topics surrounding negative self talk, bad habits, and the blame game. We also dive into what it means to self love and how to turn your life around during bad times. 

To connectg with Paul Fishman click HERE
